text.section: From among the Board members, the Governor shall appoint a chairman and vice chairman of the Board.

section.section: The Board shall appoint and the Secretary shall confirm the Board executive director.
The Board executive director may not be a member of the Board and serves at the pleasure of the Board.
The Board executive director is the executive officer of the Board.
The Board executive director shall have, at a minimum, a bachelor's degree.

text.section: The Board shall determine the duties of each officer.
